page.title: 06TEENAGER'S DAY IN S.CROYDON
page.content: I'm 14 years old,and it's Thursday,the worst school day of the week.The day starts at 5.45.when I get up to do my{ paper_round.I have my breakfast and wash and leave at 6.00.to start my round.It takes 30 minutes,so when I get back I turn on the T.V.and make my mum and dad a cup of tea,watch breakfast T.V. for a while and get ready for schol at 7.30.I leave home at 8.15. and arrive at school at 8.30.The school day starts with R.E.,followed by Biology and a double lesson of English which I dread.I finish the school day with Maths and go home at 3.00.I pop into my sister's school to take her home. When I've changed out of my uniform I go out on my bike.At 5.30. I have my dinner,then go to the youth club.I come in at 10.00. and go to bed by 10.30.
